inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient information statement and informed consent obtained

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: initial data-set will be obtained that will be identified by a unique study participation number

inclusion.criterion: sex of the baby, birth weight, intended method of feeding/milk and any medication
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: initial data-set will include sex of the baby, birth weight, intended method of feeding/milk and any medication

inclusion.criterion: study pack with instructions, urine collection bag, specimen pot, data-set collection form and pre-paid envelope
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: a study pack will be issued containing a set of instructions outlining the study, a gender-specific urine collection bag, a specimen pot labeled with the participant's unique identifying number

inclusion.criterion: free to withdraw from the study for any reason at any stage
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: it will be made clear to all participants that they are free to withdraw from the study for any reason at any stage and that this will not affect their future care

inclusion.criterion: participation is not deemed to involve any risk for patients, their families or staff involved
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: sample size of 135 participants recruited over 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: dropout rate of at least 25% is expected
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: urinary electrolytes will be measured in the Biochemistry laboratory in the Royal Hospital for Sick Children
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: samples will be disposed in accordance with the Human Tissue Authority's Code of Practice
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: postnatal admission to the neonatal unit/special care baby unit
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with the complaint of empty scrotum at the right side. The diagnostic laparoscopy showed an abdominal undescended testis.
